title: Polymetallic doping of Mn-based perovskite oxides for chemical looping dry reforming of methane
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01161A, Paper
Yihong Zhu, Juping Zhang, Dongfang Li, Tao Zhu, Xing Zhu
Chemical looping dry reforming of methane (CL-DRM) is an efficient pathway for the conversion of methane and CO2 into synthesis gas ready for Fischer-Tropsch process, which largely depends on the...
